## Results from Point-transect surveys of myna birds, using 3 distance classes
Distance class: 0-10m, 10-25m, 25-50m

675 point counts were made across 25 transects; each transect was surveyed 3 times at 9 points per transect
Mynas were observed in 84.9% of counts (573/675)
